column1: Little Goat Diner////Pork Belly Pancake - there's a mountain of coleslaw like salad. DON'T WORRY. there's a GIGANTIC slab of PORK BELLY underneath. And the spring onion pancake lies beneath this all. Love the Pork Belly. and the salad was surprisingly tasty. AND
column2: when you eat it as leftovers
column3: it is EVEN MORE flavorful and marinated! SO GOOOOD.
